lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Pl sY ibrK ibrKu sY hoq Pl AiqBuiq giq kCu khn n AwvY jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Dhal Sai Birakh Birakhu Sai Hot Dhala , Atibhouti Gati Kachhu Kahan N Aavai Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a seed of the fruit gives a tree and the tree yields the same fruit; this strange phenomena hardly comes into any say or conversation,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bwsu bwvn mY bwvn hY bwsu ibKY ibsm cirqR koaU mrmu n pwvY jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Baasu Baavan Mai Baavan Hai Baasu Bikhai , Bisam Charitr Kooo Maramu N Paavai Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as fragrance resides in sandalwood and sandalwood lives in its fragrance, none can know the deep and wonderful secret of this phenomena,

lines.gurmukhi: kwsit mY Agin Agin mY kwsit hY Aiq Ascrju hY kauqk khwvY jI
lines.transliteration_english: Kaasati Mai Agani Agani Mai Kaasati Hai , Ati Asacharaju Hai Kaoutak Kahaavai Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as wood houses fire and fire has wood burning in it; it is a marvellous phenomena. It is also called a strange spectacle.

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur mY sbd sbd mY siqgur hY inrgun igAwn iDAwn smJwvY jI ]534]
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Mai Sabad Sabad Mai Satigur Hai , Niragoun Giaan Dhiaan Samajhaavai Jee ?534?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly the name of the Lord resides in True Guru and True Guru resides in His (Lord) name. He alone can understand this mystery of the Absolute God who has obtained knowledge from True Guru and who meditates on Him.  (534)
